title: Inspection panels and hopper (charging station) opening shall be fitted with light fitting, metal doors, covers, having a fire resistance of not less than one hour
clause_text: Inspection panels and hopper (charging station) opening shall be fitted with light fitting, metal doors, covers, having a fire resistance of not less than one hour. Flap doors/covers i.e. push-in or lift-up type shall not be permitted. Refuse chutes shall not be provided in staircase walls and air conditioning shafts, etc.
